Laurence van Cott Niven (born April 30, 1938 Los Angeles, California) is a United States science fiction author ... Larry Niven Wiki is a FANDOM Books Community.
Larry Niven was working on his master's degree in mathematics when he dropped out to write science fiction. He broke into professional SF writing in 1964.
